directions: In a large pitcher, stir together the sugar, drink mix and cold water. Pour in the lemon-lime soda, and stir to blend. Place one or two scoops of ice cream into glasses, and pour the punch over them. It will make a 'potion' that bubbles up.
ingredients: 1 (0.13 ounce) package unsweetened, fruit-flavored soft drink mix
title: Shelby's Magic Potion
